title: Phobetron: Biblical Prophecy & Celestial Pattern Detection System
description: Phobetron is the world's first integration of biblical prophecy analysis, NASA-grade astronomical precision tracking, and machine learning correlation models for seismos (σεισμός) natural disasters. The system combines real-time 3D solar system visualization with hyperbolic orbit support, Hebrew calendar integration, and four trained ML models achieving 75%+ accuracy in detecting patterns between celestial events and terrestrial disasters (earthquakes, volcanic eruptions, hurricanes, tsunamis) based on Greek biblical terminology.
notes: This software represents the first integration of biblical eschatology with modern machine learning and astronomical tracking. The system uses Greek biblical terminology (σεισμός - seismos) to categorize natural disasters and correlates them with celestial events using four trained ML models. Includes production deployment on Railway with PostgreSQL/PostGIS database, 14 functional pages with Catalyst UI, and comprehensive documentation.
references: Luke 21:11 - Signs in sun, moon and stars
Revelation 6:12 - Great earthquake and celestial signs
